text: Arlen Ray Royalty (born May 27, 1959) is a major general in the United States Army, who served as the commanding general of the 84th Training Command. He is a graduate of the United States Military Academy.https://www.usar.army.mil/Leadership/Article- View/Article/1263446/major-general-a-ray-royalty/ ==References== Category:Living people Category:1959 births
title: A. Ray Royalty
